XData.name: ProductionDefinition
XData.Data: <Production Name="Demo.PEX.Production.RemoteOutboundAdapter" LogGeneralTraceEvents="false"> <Description></Description> <ActorPoolSize>2</ActorPoolSize> <Item Name="Demo.PEX.TickerService" Category="" ClassName="Demo.PEX.TickerService" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Host" Name="TargetConfigName">Demo.PEX.BusinessOperation</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="RemoteMessagePackageName">com.intersystems.demo.pex</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="Demo.PEX.BusinessOperation" Category="" ClassName="Demo.PEX.BusinessOperation" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="true" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="%gatewayPort">44444</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="%gatewayExtraClasspaths">c:\PEXDemo\intersystems-PEX-demo-1.0.0.jar;c:\PEXDemo\gson-2.8.5.jar</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="%remoteClassname">com.intersystems.demo.pex.OutboundAdapter</Setting> </Item> </Production>
